questions.question: Your partner enters the room in a new outfit, they ask you how they look, what is your response?

choice.c: I think it would look better on the floor baby. Rrraaooow!

questions.question: A clown stands before you, wearing your fathers clothes. He prophesises your death in 7 years. How does he say you die?

choice.a: Got hit by a steam roller
choice.c: A skydiving accident. The sexy kind
choice.d: He says it softly, and sadly. But gently

questions.question: Everyone you love stands before you, it’s a surprise birthday! How do you react?

choice.c: Get naked and start partying. Yeah!

questions.question: You are trapped in a room with a bear, a kiddie pool filled with Jello, the MP for Edinburgh Central, and a banana that may, or may not be sentient. What do you do?

choice.c: Sounds like my kind of party. Groovy!
choice.d: Test the sentience of the banana

questions.question: What is the weirdest thing you have seen in someone else’s home?

choice.c: They had their own minaturised clones. Really not my bag

questions.question: You are stranded on a desert island, you can only eat one food. What is it?
You are creating a new secret order to begin your plans of world domination. What do you name it?

choice.c: The Groovy Brethern of the Beast with Two Backs

questions.question: Your time has come and Death stands before you. He challenges you, a game for your life. What game do you play?

choice.c: Blackjack, I like to live dangerously

questions.question: If you could be any living person for a day, who do you choose?

choice.c: I'd choose me of course. Or Hugh Hefner
